column5: Hi,Can anyone tell me what the gas price is per liter at either Cranberry or Flin Flon.Thanks Much

Just passed through the area - at gas stations it is 67-72cents/litre, or about $2.00USD per US gallon..add 10-12% for premium. With the exception of a few places in Canada and the USA, Gas prices with exchange seem to be closer than ever across the board!
Prices were in the $.70 range a week ago. Paid $.79 for unleaded premium.
Thanks Everyone. We are heading up Friday Morning.
